Class DashboardController

  • java.lang.Object
    • com.intelmas.controller.DashboardController

  • @CrossOrigin
 @RestController
public class DashboardController
extends java.lang.Object
    Class to catch requests from FE with Dashboard operations.

    Brian Mm

    • Method Detail

      • saveDashboard

        @RequestMapping(value="/dashboard",
                method=POST)
public MessageResponse saveDashboard(@RequestBody
                                                                                                        DashboardRequest newDashboard)
        Parameters:
        newDashboard - JSON object with data to create/update dashboard.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse object with success/fail message after save process.

      • getDashboard

        @RequestMapping(value="/dashboard/{id}",
                method=GET)
public DashboardRequest getDashboard(@PathVariable(value="id")
                                                                                                            java.lang.String id)
        Parameters:
        id - of dashboard to get from DB.
        Returns:
        DashboardRequest object with information found in DB.

      • getDashboardList

        @RequestMapping(value="/dashboard/list/{user}",
                method=GET)
public java.util.List<DashboardRequest> getDashboardList(@PathVariable(value="user")
                                                                                                                                       java.lang.String user)
        Parameters:
        user - id related to dashboards saved to get from DB.
        Returns:
        List of DashboardRequest objects with all results found in DB.

      • deleteDashboard

        @RequestMapping(value="/dashboard/delete/{dash_id}",
                method=GET)
public MessageResponse deleteDashboard(@PathVariable(value="dash_id")
                                                                                                                          java.lang.String dash_id)
        Parameters:
        dash_id - to delete in DB.
        Returns:
        MessageResponse object with success/fail message after delete process.
